title: Karthus
body: Will karthus get a buff anytime soon or a rework or something?

replies.body:
Riot has not confirmed any major reworks for karthus (as they are currently working on urgot and eve) or said that they are aware of any balance issues they need to work on with him. A future rework is definitely possible but not in the near future.

If I can recall correctly the last major karthus change was a nerf so in riots opinion they probably view karthus as a strong, if not balanced champion.
The ult is but he's rarely picked in my Elo.
